data.title: Outside tiki was interesting.
data.text: Had burgers, fries etc.  It was a quiet night but waitress was friendly and efficient.  It was not very crowded.

data.title: Great relaxing spot!!!
data.text: Always fresh food, great bartenders and wait staff. I highly recommend stopping in for a cold one and some grub after a long day of work!

data.title: Pleasantly Surprised- good food and service
data.text: This location has been various bars and restaurants over the years. This seems to be one of the best. My girlfriend and I thoroughly enjoyed the seafood quesadilla. The food and service were good and price were fair.

data.title: Great tasting food and great service.
data.text: Glad there is new ownership and name change at this restaurant.Food is always tasting great and the pricing is very fare.

data.title: Fantastic little hidden gem
data.text: Stopped here on the way to Coral Cove beach in Jupiter, FL. Place was clean and food was excellent. Had the blackened mahi mahi with mango salsa. It was fantastic! Staff was friendly and attentive.

data.title: Shrimp
data.text: Excellent peal and eat shrimp with the potato pancakes. I'm going back this weekend to vend at the saltwater art show from 11 to 6.

data.title: Excellent find
data.text: Visiting Jupiter and looking for dinner we found this.  It was excellent and we all enjoyed dinner. Priced very reasonable.  Husband loved the Ahi wrap.

data.title: EXCELLENT APPETIZERS AND ENTREES!!!
data.text: A very informal yet spacious and happy resort-style restaurant provides great atmosphere for families, professionals and tourists with the charm of a neighborhood locals secret delight.  Love the oceanic theme.  Food is EXCELLENT!  Best artichoke dip hands down!  Local surprise is the Latin Beef Stew (with Salsa Verde for a spicy kick).  SERVICE is EXCEPTIONALLY friendly, professional and attentive (Janice, Jean or Ali will take great care of you).  The other entrees and appetizers merit a five-star taste rating!  Schedule a definite stop either for lunch or dinner.  Nighttime entertainment promotes local bands and musicians!  Five Stars for food quality and GREAT PRICES!!!

data.title: this photo
data.text: Based on this photo I would not even try this restaurant. I hope someone from your company lets these guys know how unappitizing this photo is.

data.title: Good family friendly food.
data.text: Sunday night dinner after boating. We ordered Lobster bisque. Good soup with a strong red base. Typical childrens chicken tender plate was large and could have fed 2 children. The mahi quesiadilla was large and quite tasty. Enough for a meal or to share.

data.title: Casual night out
data.text: Celebrated pre-wedding night. We were a large group of people, close to 30. At the first the drinks came a bit slow but they were able to speed it up. Drinks and appetizers were fine. Doesn't have a lot of atmosphere. We waited for the Karaoke, but they decided to move to 10 PM (originally was going to start at 9), so we needed up leaving around 9:30. OK for casual night out.

data.title: Really good, inexpensive food!
data.text: Happened upon this place on Easter Sunday, not a good day to be out and about without reservations. Saw this place and looked interesting, so figured we would give it a try. Imagine our surprise with how good the good was. I had a chicken salad sandwich which had craisine & apples in. Was just yummy and so big. Would have liked to try the soup, but just couldn't fit another bite. Everyone in our group had only good things to say. Look forward to our next visit.

data.title: Great atmosphere, friendly staff.
data.text: First appearance walking in is a causal beach/ surfer vibe. Great drinks, food is delicious with an island flare. Staff is super friendly- Mike, Steven, Paco, Ivan and Janice. Lunch specials are reasonable. The happy hour is where it's at!! Cheers

data.title: Great food, great staff, great happy hour!!!
data.text: The food is excellent! Must try Phils famous baked wings and the quesadillas. Daily lunch specials are also really good and a very fair price. Fried peanut butter and jelly with ice cream for dessert? To die for!!! The outdoor tiki area and patio are really nice with plenty of tvs. The owner Johnny and his team of mangers are super friendly and accommodating. Great locals place with awesome fun bartenders like Janice, Michael, Steven and Paco. One of the best sorts bars/restaurant in Jupiter!

data.title: Surprisngly Good Food and Choices for this kind of locals hangout. More drinkers than eaters!
data.text: We are locals and have been pleasantly surprised now twice with Johnny Mangos. The atmosphere inside is Spartan to say the least. But both times our waiters and food were good. Watch out Duffys if this place catches on. Kid friendly with kids eat free with adult meal on Wednesdays but double check that.

data.title: Over priced drinks!
data.text: We went to Johnny Mangos last night for our first time. We were charged an additional $2.50 for "on the rocks" drinks. It was very smoky and for these reasons we will not return.

data.title: good bargain and tasty lunch
data.text: went with wife and friends for lunch. although the place had just opened the food was wonderful and fresh. The waitress was charming and the presentations were great. Wife got a salad and I got a burger. Fun place.

data.title: Loved our dinners!
data.text: Went twice this month and loved our dinners both times!  Crab cakes, Caribbean jerk fish, crab legs and the fish Reuben were all great.  My husband loved the accompanying black beans and rice also.  Definitely recommend !!!

data.title: Friendly Bar/eaterie,
data.text: Good grub and great selection of Beers ably served by Mean Jean the Bar Machine. Locals are a friendly bunch too. Made this Englishman feel right at home.

data.title: Not keeping up with the competition
data.text: Got a burger, the bun was soggy and the patty was just ok. They gave me about 10 fries and the smallest serving of coleslaw I've seen. Not worth the $10. Service was kind of weak. A bar & grill in Jupiter needs to do better than this to compete.
